channel.title: Gasoline Prices on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Michigan gas price maps from GasBuddy
item.description:
GasBuddy has built a very nice infrastructure for tracking gas prices across the county. If you sign up, you can update the site with current observations of pricing; if you don't sign up, you can still view individual and aggregated data.
The map above is not quite enough to decide where to stop, except to note that if you happen to be heading south you should probably fill up in Ohio, not Michigan (tax differences account for the price difference).
